info.author: Thomas Volk
info.description:
rpcServices is a python library for managing scalable distributed Systems via 
xml-Rpc. A master server provides several services to local and remote client 
processes.
info.name: rpcservices
info.summary: rpcServices -- library for managing scalable distributed Systems via xml-Rpc
info.html_description: rpcServices is a python library for managing scalable distributed Systems via xml-Rpc. A master server provides several services to local and remote client processes.
